hero.title: Rhythm & Brews
hero.subtitle: A fun, exciting, high-quality community open mic night — exclusively for live music performances.
hero.meta: Live music only • Musicians welcome • All ages • Aguadilla, Puerto Rico
hero.followForUpdates: Follow us on Instagram for the latest updates

intro.paragraph1: Rhythm & Brews is a community-driven open mic night dedicated exclusively to live music performances — singers, instrumentalists, bands, and solo acts are all welcome.
intro.paragraph2: Whether you're stepping on stage for the first time or you've been performing for years, this is a place to play, connect, and have a great time.
intro.paragraph3: Come to perform, come to listen, or just come to support local musicians — the energy is always better with a full room.
intro.paragraph4: Please note: This event is for musical performances only. Poetry, comedy, and spoken word are not part of this open mic format.

signup.title: Performer Sign-Up
signup.paragraph1: Sign-up happens in person only and is first come, first served.
signup.paragraph2: Slots are limited, so arrive early if you want to play.
details: Solo acts, duos, and full bands all welcome
All genres welcome: rock, folk, jazz, Latin, R&B, and more
signup.note: This is a family-friendly community event. We're here to support each other, have fun, and create a positive space for live music.
signup.musicOnly: Musical performances only — vocals, instruments, bands. No poetry, comedy, or spoken word.
signup.bringDescription: Feel free to bring your own gear if you prefer:
bringItems: Your own instrument (if you have a preference)
Guitar picks, drum sticks, or other accessories
Any special pedals or effects you want to use

location.title: When & Where
location.paragraph1: Rhythm & Brews is hosted at The Beer Box in Aguadilla, with great drinks and a welcoming atmosphere.
location.paragraph2: Events are held occasionally, so dates may change. Follow us on Instagram for the latest updates.
location.address: The Beer Box, Aguadilla, Puerto Rico
location.parkingInfo: Street parking is available nearby. Arrive early for the best spots.
location.accessibilityInfo: The venue is accessible. Please contact us if you have specific accessibility needs.

items.question: Do I need to sign up online?
items.answer: No. Performer sign-up happens in person only and is first come, first served. There is no online registration.

items.question: What kind of performers are welcome?
items.answer: Rhythm & Brews is all about live music. We welcome musicians of all styles and experience levels — from first-timers to seasoned performers.

items.question: Is this event beginner-friendly?
items.answer: Absolutely. This is a supportive, community-focused night. If it's your first time performing, you'll feel right at home.

items.question: How long can I perform?
items.answer: Each performer has up to 15 minutes. This helps make sure everyone gets a chance to play and keeps the night moving smoothly.

items.question: Do performers need to bring their own instruments?
items.answer: You're welcome to bring your own, but we also provide a basic backline, including microphones, PA, an Orange amp, electric and acoustic guitars, a small drum kit, cajón drum, and direct boxes.

items.question: Is there a sound system provided?
items.answer: Yes — a basic sound system is provided.

items.question: Can I perform more than once?
items.answer: Sometimes. If there are open slots at the end of the night, performers may be invited back up, and we occasionally turn it into a fun group jam session.

items.question: Are bands allowed?
items.answer: Yes, as long as setup is quick and space allows. Full drum kits are not permitted, but bands are welcome to use the provided kit.

items.question: Is this event family-friendly?
items.answer: Yes. Rhythm & Brews is a family-friendly community event. We ask everyone to be respectful so the night stays fun and welcoming for all.
